headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Marriott International Stock?
summary: While Marriott International has underperformed the S&P 500 Index over the past 52 weeks, Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook about the stock’s prospects.

content.title: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Marriott International Stock?
content.summary: While Marriott International has underperformed the S&P 500 Index over the past 52 weeks, Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook about the stock’s prospects.

headline: BlackRock Joins Marriott in Getting Caught Up in Sonder Collapse
summary: The company’s bankruptcy has already dealt a blow to Marriott International Inc., which made Sonder hotels bookable on its website and app in an ill-fated bid to add rooms to its global network.  Marriott provided funding to “critical short-term obligations” the day before it terminated the licensing agreement, according to a court filing on Friday.  Several entities under BlackRock, including BlackRock Global Allocation Fund and BlackRock Global Long/Short Credit Fund were listed as creditors.
